item.title: Quadratic Bezier Curves
item.description: Quadratic Bézier curves are explicit parametric functions of the following form: These curves are perhaps the simplest class of parametric curves, but useful in their own right. This is a small demo of such curves. Drag the control points around to see the curve change.
